text: Distributing list items to variables in python
I'm fairly new to Python and I'm looking for a way to distribute items in a list into individual variables.
The point of this is to display individual items as text objects in Blender.
Here's what I have so far, but I know there's gotta be a more efficient way to go about doing this.

code:
file = open('lyrics.conf')
data = file.read()
file.close()
b = data.split('/')
v = len(b)

if v >= 1:
  v1 = b[0]
if v >= 2:
  v2 = b[1]
if v >= 3:
  v3 = b[2]
if v >= 4:
  v4 = b[3]
if v >= 5:
  v5 = b[4]
if v >= 6:
  v6 = b[5]
if v >= 7:
  v7 = b[6]
if v >= 8:
  v8 = b[7]
if v >= 9:
  v9 = b[8]
if v >= 10:
  v10 = b[9]
